body_html:
@fo40225 your suggestions make sense too. Posted a few comments there.

Actually would be better to use something like FindMKL instead of all this custom stuff. Should consistently use find_package for mkl, openmp, and anything else.

body:
@fo40225 your suggestions make sense too. Posted a few comments there. 

Actually would be better to use something like FindMKL instead of all this custom stuff. Should consistently use find_package for mkl, openmp, and anything else.
